name: Clandestiny
description: Witty, cynical, and heir to a legacy of cowardice, Andrew MacPhiles makes for an unlikely hero. Convinced to leave his modern New York apartment by his fearless girlfriend, Paula, he fearfully answers a mysterious summons to claim his ancestral home. And so he returns to the muddy stretch of land where stands the Castle MacPhiles, refuge to the most cowardly clan ever to stumble its way into Scottish history. There, he must fulfill an ancient prophecy, and defeat a deadly curse that has plagued his family for generations.... Join Andrew and Paula through quivering encounters with the castle's odd inhabitants, and intriguing exploration of its eerie rooms and hidden passageways. Solve "wee" rascally riddles and perplexing puzzles to learn how a legacy of dimwitted cowardice led the clan to near extinction. Unravel the story piece-by-piece, unveiling Andrew's destiny, and ultimately unleashing an electrifying confrontation with the real Beast Within. From the creators of The 7th Guest and The 11th Hour comes this clever composite of stunning 3D graphics and lively animation. Three levels of difficulty pose a challenge to novices and experienced gamers alike. And the enchanting story by renowned author Jahnna N. Malcolm makes the journey worth the taking. Clandestiny is an experience that will come back to haunt you... if you've got the courage to take it.
